DOC.brief_summary: To determine the effectiveness of a single checklist reminder form to improve the delivery of preventive health services at adult health check-ups in a family practice setting.
DOC.brief_title: Improving Preventive Service Delivery at Adult Complete Health Check-Ups
DOC.criteria: Adults older than 21 years of age who had an complete health checkup completed at the clinic during the study period. Charts were excluded if the patient was younger than 21, an investigator completed the assessment or the encounter was disease/illness specific.
